document_data.name: Storm's Front Tavern
document_data.mainbody: The '''Storm's Front Tavern''' was a tavern in [[Waterdeep|Waterdeep's]] [[Sea Ward of Waterdeep|Sea Ward]].
document_data.Structure: The tavern was decorated with a nautical theme so it looked like a faux [[Dock Ward of Waterdeep|Dock Ward]] tavern.
document_data.History: In [[1480 DR]], the Storm's Front Tavern was burned to the ground during a confrontation between the [[Deva (aasimar)|deva]] [[Jinnaoth Ir'Gadohn]] and the dark [[Angel (astral)|angel]] [[Sathariel]].
